trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>GET</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic returns an <languageKeyword>AccountDetails</languageKeyword> object for the specified Media Services account.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>GET</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic returns an <languageKeyword>AccountDetails</languageKeyword> object for the specified Media Services account.

trans-unit.source: The data contract for <languageKeyword>AccountDetails</languageKeyword> is defined later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: The data contract for <languageKeyword>AccountDetails</languageKeyword> is defined later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: The request may be specified as follows (replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name):

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
